reviews.review_msg: Tom is a wonderful instructor. He always wants his students to do well, and is always willing to help whenever you need it. That being said, his "lectures" are mostly self-guided, meaning that instead of teaching, we learn the material  on our own, and discuss in class. Mid-term and final are easy if you study. Final is cumulative.

A great course from a great professor with a wide range of knowledge. His collaborative teaching style lets students interact with course material and understand it much more than only using a textbook (still, to do well you will need to read it thoroughly). Tom genuinely cares about the success of his students. I would take a class with him again.
